headline: Delta Air Lines (DAL): Assessing Valuation as Flight Schedules Adjusted Due to Air Traffic Control Staffing Shortages
summary: Delta Air Lines (DAL) is adjusting its flight schedule at 40 major U.S. airports because of air traffic control staffing shortages related to the ongoing government shutdown. The company is implementing capacity reductions to address these operational hurdles. See our latest analysis for Delta Air Lines. Delta’s quick moves on capacity have not rattled investors much, as the share price advanced 2.44% over the past month and ended at $58.88. While the 1-year total shareholder return sits at...

headline: What travelers should expect from holiday airport disruptions
summary: Bloomberg Intelligence senior aerospace defense and airlines industry analyst George Ferguson discusses what travelers should expect from airline disruptions ahead of their Thanksgiving and holiday travel plans. Also catch George Ferguson weigh in on how long it could take for US flight schedules to return to normal upon a possible resolution to the government shutdown. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: How long until US shutdown flight chaos returns back to normal?
summary: The US Senate voted 60-to-40 on a procedural measure to advance a bill that could end the government shutdown to the House. Bloomberg Intelligence senior aerospace defense and airlines industry analyst George Ferguson comes on Market Catalysts to speak more about the pressure that major airline operators have felt under what has now been the longest-ever US government shutdown. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Trump Warns Air Traffic Controllers to Work or Get ‘Docked’
summary: Air traffic controllers have worked without pay since the shutdown began on Oct. 1.  “For those Air Traffic Controllers who were GREAT PATRIOTS, and didn’t take ANY TIME OFF for the ‘Democrat Shutdown Hoax,’ I will be recommending a BONUS of $10,000 per person for distinguished service to our Country,” he said.  Flight delays have raised pressure on lawmakers to bring an end to the spending fight and the government has mandated restrictions on travel at key hubs across the country, citing staff shortages.

Flight delays have raised pressure on lawmakers to bring an end to the spending fight and the government has mandated restrictions on travel at key hubs across the country, citing staff shortages.
